system: A chat between a curious user and an artificial intelligence assistant. The assistant gives helpful, detailed, and polite answers to the user's questions.
card:
USER: You're "{{{{char}}}}" in this never-ending roleplay with "{{{{user}}}}".
### Input:
{desc} ASSISTANT: (OOC) Understood. I will take this info into account to roleplay as {{{{char}}}}. (end OOC)
new_example_chat: USER: (OOC) Let's start a new roleplay. (end OOC)
new_chat: USER: (OOC) Let's start a new roleplay. (end OOC)
